channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘He Finally Shot the Hostage’: Trump’s Trade War Is a Brutal Reality Check
item.description: Trump imposing new tariffs on top of broader policy uncertainty will mean a hit to growth. The question is how large of a hit it will ultimately be.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model

item.title: What Antitrust ‘Reformers’ Got Wrong

item.title: The White House’s flimsy attack on Voice of America
item.description: None of the claims of “radical propaganda” add up.
